00022 const TypePtrConverterMap &TypePtrBase::converters()
00023 {
00024     return util::Singletons::get<_internal::TypePtrConverterMap, 0>();

00026 
00027 const TypePtrBase::Converter &TypePtrBase::getConverterTo( unsigned short id )const
00028 {
00029     const TypePtrConverterMap::const_iterator f1 = converters().find( typeID() );
00030     LOG_IF( f1 == converters().end(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known conversion from " << util::getTypeMap()[typeID()];
00031     const TypePtrConverterMap::mapped_type::const_iterator f2 = f1->second.find( id );
00032     LOG_IF( f2 == f1->second.end(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known conversion from " << util::getTypeMap()[typeID()] << " to " << util::getTypeMap()[id];
00033     return f2->second;
00034 }
00035 
00036 size_t TypePtrBase::cmp( const TypePtrBase &comp )const
00037 {
00038     LOG_IF( len() != comp.len(), Runtime, info ) << "Comparing data of different length. The difference will be added to the returned value.";
00039     return len() - comp.len() + cmp( 0, std::min( len(), comp.len() ) - 1, comp, 0 );
00040 }

00042 TypePtrBase::Reference TypePtrBase::copyToNewById( unsigned short id ) const
00043 {
00044     return copyToNewById( id, getScalingTo( id ) );
00045 }
00046 TypePtrBase::Reference TypePtrBase::copyToNewById( unsigned short id, const scaling_pair &scaling ) const
00047 {
00048     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( id );
00049 
00050     if( conv ) {
00051         boost::scoped_ptr<TypePtrBase> ret;
00052         conv->generate( *this, ret, scaling );
00053         return *ret;
00054     } else {
00055         LOG( Runtime, error )
00056                 << "I dont know any conversion from "
00057                 << util::MSubject( toString( true ) ) << " to " << util::MSubject( util::getTypeMap( false, true )[id] );
00058         return Reference(); // return an empty Reference
00059     }
00060 }

00062 void TypePtrBase::copyRange( size_t start, size_t end, TypePtrBase &dst, size_t dst_start )const
00063 {
00064     assert( start <= end );
00065     const size_t length = end - start + 1;
00066     LOG_IF( ! dst.isSameType( *this ), Debug, error )
00067             << "Copying into a TypePtr of different type. Its " << dst.typeName() << " not " << typeName();
00068 
00069     if( end >= len() ) {
00070         LOG( Runtime, error )
00071                 << "End of the range (" << end << ") is behind the end of this TypePtr (" << len() << ")";
00072     } else if( length + dst_start > dst.len() ) {
00073         LOG( Runtime, error )
00074                 << "End of the range (" << length + dst_start << ") is behind the end of the destination (" << dst.len() << ")";
00075     } else {
00076         boost::shared_ptr<void> daddr = dst.getRawAddress().lock();
00077         boost::shared_ptr<void> saddr = getRawAddress().lock();
00078         const size_t soffset = bytes_per_elem() * start; //source offset in bytes
00079         const int8_t *const  src = ( int8_t * )saddr.get();
00080         const size_t doffset = bytes_per_elem() * dst_start;//destination offset in bytes
00081         int8_t *const  dest = ( int8_t * )daddr.get();
00082         const size_t blength = length * bytes_per_elem();//length in bytes
00083         memcpy( dest + doffset, src + soffset, blength );
00084     }
00085 }

00087 scaling_pair TypePtrBase::getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, autoscaleOption scaleopt )const
00088 {
00089     util::TypeReference min, max;
00090     getMinMax( min, max );
00091     assert( ! ( min.empty() || max.empty() ) );
00092     return TypePtrBase::getScalingTo( typeID, *min, *max );
00093 }
00094 
00095 scaling_pair TypePtrBase::getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, const util::_internal::TypeBase &min, const util::_internal::TypeBase &max, autoscaleOption scaleopt )const
00096 {
00097     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( typeID );
00098 
00099     if ( conv ) {
00100         return conv->getScaling( min, max, scaleopt );
00101     } else {
00102         LOG( Runtime, error )
00103                 << "I dont know any conversion from " << util::MSubject( typeName() ) << " to " << util::MSubject( util::getTypeMap( false, true )[typeID] );
00104         return scaling_pair();
00105     }
00106 }
00107 bool TypePtrBase::convertTo( TypePtrBase &dst )const
00108 {
00109     return convertTo( dst, getScalingTo( dst.typeID() ) );
00110 }
00111 bool TypePtrBase::convertTo( TypePtrBase &dst, const scaling_pair &scaling ) const
00112 {
00113     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( dst.typeID() );
00114 
00115     if ( conv ) {
00116         conv->convert( *this, dst, scaling );
00117         return true;
00118     } else {
00119         LOG( Runtime, error )
00120                 << "I dont know any conversion from " << util::MSubject( typeName() ) << " to " << util::MSubject( dst.typeName() );
00121         return false;
00122     }
00123 }

00130 bool TypePtrBase::swapAlong( TypePtrBase &dst, const size_t dim, const size_t dims[]  ) const
00131 {
00132     boost::shared_ptr<void> daddr = dst.getRawAddress().lock();
00133     boost::shared_ptr<void> saddr = getRawAddress().lock();
00134     const int8_t *const  src = ( int8_t * )saddr.get();
00135     int8_t *const dest = ( int8_t * )daddr.get();
00136 
00137     if ( dim == 0 ) {
00138         size_t index_forward = 0;
00139         size_t index_y = 0;
00140 
00141         for ( size_t z = 0; z < dims[2]; z++ ) {
00142             for ( size_t y = 0; y < dims[1]; y++ ) {
00143                 index_y++;
00144 
00145                 for ( size_t direction = 0; direction < dims[0]; direction++ ) {
00146                     memcpy( dest + index_forward * bytes_per_elem(), src + ( ( index_y * dims[0] ) - direction - 1 ) * bytes_per_elem(), bytes_per_elem() );
00147                     index_forward++;
00148                 }
00149             }
00150         }
00151 
00152         return 1;
00153     } else if ( dim == 1 ) {
00154         for ( size_t z = 0; z < dims[2]; z++ ) {
00155             for ( size_t direction = 0; direction < dims[dim]; direction++ ) {
00156                 memcpy( dest + ( ( dims[0] * direction ) + z * dims[0] * dims[1] ) * bytes_per_elem(), src + ( ( dims[0] * ( dims[1] - direction - 1 ) ) + z * dims[0] * dims[1] ) * bytes_per_elem(), bytes_per_elem() * dims[0] );
00157             }
00158         }
00159 
00160         return 1;
00161     } else if ( dim == 2 ) {
00162         for ( size_t direction = 0; direction < dims[dim]; direction++ ) {
00163             memcpy( dest + direction * dims[0]*dims[1]*bytes_per_elem(), src + ( dims[dim] - direction - 1 )*dims[0]*dims[1]*bytes_per_elem(), bytes_per_elem()*dims[0]*dims[1] );
00164         }
00165 
00166         return 1;
00167     } else {
00168         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Swapping along axis referred by " << dim << " is not possible!";
00169         return 0;
00170     }
00171 }
